alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 4:05PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Less than 2 inches of snow between 4 and 7 PM. * WHERE...Sullivan, Otsego and Delaware counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Steady snow continues before tapering off and ending during the late afternoon and early evening hours. Snowfall rates are generally around one-half inch per hour. It will be a dry powdery snow with temperatures in the 20s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
